## cornerBisector variable

Returns normalized bisector vector for point `b` in the triangle `a` -<!-- -->&gt; `b` -<!-- -->&gt; `c`<!-- -->. If `out` is null, creates a new result vector.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cornerBisector: VecOpVVV
```
